arStrings.szText: Critical Strikes with {c_important}Storm{/c} Skills that you cast charge the air around you for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"||]{/c} seconds causing a {c_important}Lightning Bolt{/c} to periodically hit an enemy in the area for {c_number}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * Affix_Value_2]{/c} Lightning damage. This duration can be extended by additional Critical Strikes.

Critical Strikes with {c_important}Storm{/c} Skills cause a {c_important}Lightning Bolt{/c} to periodically deal {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * Affix_Value_2]{/c} Lightning damage.
